_definition.iso_639_3_eng: This object contains all core dictionary properties that have the function of documenting [terms](_term), [structures](_term_object) and [descriptors](_term_descriptor).

_description.iso_639_3_eng:
This [data structure](_type_object) features the *properties* that are used to document terms in the data dictionary. This object features the following [descriptors](_term_descriptor):

- [Title](_title): Term *title*, *name* or *label*.
- [Definition](_definition): A one paragraph *text* that provides a *definition* or summary *explanation*.
- [Description](_description): A long *styled text* that provides a *thorough explanation* for the term.
- [Examples](_examples): Term *usage* real world *examples*
- [Notes](_notes): *Notes*, *comments* and *feedback*.
